alb_dns_name.description: Public DNS name of the Application Load Balancer.

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL to push the container image to.

acm_certificate_arn.description: ACM certificate ARN for the ALB HTTPS listener (required if enable_https=true).

container_port.description: Port the Flask container listens on.

create_ecr_repository.description: If true, create an ECR repository. If false, provide existing_ecr_repository_url.

enable_https.description: If true, create HTTPS listener and redirect HTTP->HTTPS. Requires ACM cert ARN.

existing_ecr_repository_url.description: Existing ECR repository URL (e.g., 123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/repo). Used when create_ecr_repository=false.

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path.

image_tag.description: Container image tag to deploy from ECR.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.
